definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: Stochastic resonance is studied in amplitude and frequency modulating processes.
sentences.chinese: 研究调幅和调频过程中的随机共振。

sentences.english: The radio can handle 30 FM presets and 10 AM presets.
sentences.chinese: 该电台可处置30个调频预置，上午10点预置。

sentences.english: This paper discussed the application and maintenance of college foreign language FM radio station.
sentences.chinese: 该文对高校外语调频电台的应用与维护进行了探讨。

sentences.english: The time-delay estimator of complex LFM based on cyclic cross-correlation amplitude is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 研究了复线性调频信号的循环互相关估计时延问题。

sentences.english: In theory, the FM network will not be the moire .
sentences.chinese: 从理论上讲，调频网是不会产生龟纹的。

sentences.english: The limit of the range resolution of a LFM radar depends on the bandwidth of transmitted waveform.
sentences.chinese: 线性调频雷达的极限分辨力取决于发射波形的带宽。

sentences.english: Classic Fm is my favorite, please tune it in.
sentences.chinese: 古典调频电台是我的最爱，请调到那个频段。

sentences.english: Astoria uses frequency modulation motor, belt drive, to achieve a continuously variable.
sentences.chinese: 道夫采用调频电机，齿形带传动，实现了无级变速。

sentences.english: Wood boxes, searching coding switch, Double FM channels.
sentences.chinese: 木质外箱，可寻址解码开关机，调频双通道。

sentences.english: The station I listen to most often is on FM .
sentences.chinese: 我最常听的广播电台是在调频网。

sentences.english: She turned the dial and picked up a Japanese radio station.
sentences.chinese: 她转动收音机调频，收到了一个日本广播电台。

sentences.english: This paper analyzes the technology of frequency agility and FM fixed-distance in the field of radio fuze.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了无线电引信中的频率捷变调频定距技术。

sentences.english: A new algorithm for estimating the parameters of LFMCW signals is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种线性调频连续波信号参数估计算法。

sentences.english: Modulation sheet is mainly used in adjusting DY of TV picture tube.
sentences.chinese: 调频片主要用于电视显象管补正DY用。

sentences.english: Retuning into you, as I feel the link very weak .
sentences.chinese: 重新调频与你们连接，因为我感到连接非常虚弱了。

sentences.english: In a facility near Taipei, he began making plastic channel-changing knobs for black-and-white television sets.
sentences.chinese: 一开始他在台北附近生产黑白电视机的塑料调频旋钮。

definition: broadcast/CL:個|个[ge4]/broadcasting/to broadcast/(formal) to propagate/to publicize
harmonious/to adjust/to tune (e.g. wireless receiver)/to bring into harmony
to receive a radio signal/to make an audio recording/(of an auditorium etc) to have good acoustics/(vocal training, linguistics) ending (of a word or syllable)
